alert.note: Alert for Adams; Hall (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 12:56AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Adams and southeastern Hall Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1255 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kenesaw, or 11 miles west of Hastings, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Juniata and Prosser around 110 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hastings, Hansen and Doniphan. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 304 and 317. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
